1.0.name: wordpress/blogml-importer
1.0.description:
Import posts, comments, users, and categories from a BlogML file.

Based on BlogML importer written by Aaron Lerch (http://www.aaronlerch.com/) and modified to work with Wordpress 3.0.

Note: Plugin may not import categories or tags properly into WordPress. For instance, during my install there were no tags installed, and the categories were defined as GUIDs. A simple rename and retag fixed this issue.
